ygData.subject: Re: 1-Handed
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, I beleive that 2h is better in the long run, but in the ealier level 1h is better. I m still in the ealy levels so I vote 1H
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, I beleive that 2h is better in the long run, but in the ealier level 1h is better.

I'm still in the ealy levels so I vote 1H



Andy wrote:

> From: Andy <skimaster@...>
>
> I am starting a pll. Which do yu prefer, 1-Handed or 2-Handed slashing? I prefer 2-Handed.
>
> Tulwump
